required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 27, 2015
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Follow-up Study of L059 (Levetiracetam) in Epileptic Patients With Partial Onset Seizures by Open Label Method
clinical_study.official_title: Follow-up Study of L059 (Levetiracetam) in Epileptic Patients With Partial Onset Seizures by Open Label Method

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare

brief_summary.textblock: The safety and efficacy of L059 will be evaluated in patients who completed "N165 Clinical Trial of L059". They will receive L059 at a daily dose from 1,000 mg to 3,000 mg in addition to their standard concomitant AEDs

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who completed the evaluation period (Week 16) of N165 Clinical Trial of L059
2. Patients/the parent or guardian wish to continue treatment with L059 and to enter N165 Follow-up Study, and also the investigator admit the necessity of the repeated intake of the investigational drug for the patients.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who had not participate in N165 Clinical Trial of L059.
2. Patients who had participated in N165 Clinical Trial of L059 with no intention of entering the follow-up study taking the same medication.
3. Patients had not been in compliance with requirements of Protocol for N165 Clinical Trial of L059 in the course of the study.
